title: Four Bedroom House for Sale in Hokandara
details:
Spacious well designed house offering extensive living space with four bedrooms and three bathrooms. The property also features a large garden and car porch with parking for many vehicles.

The property has been maintained to a high standard throughout and benefits from fully tiled floors and a separate wet and dry kitchen, both fitted with cupboards. The master bedroom sits on the first floor, thoughtfully designed with plenty of space and a spacious ensuite master bathroom. Additionally there are two more bedrooms on the 1st and ground floor. A well configured family house in an convenient location.

- Four bedrooms, three bathrooms. Master bath equipped with hot water.
- Spacious living room & dining area.
- Upstairs TV lounge and living area.
- Separate pantry and wet kitchen.
- Large landscaped garden.
- Maid's room & bathroom.
- Electric roller garage door with parking for four vehicles within premises.
- 20 foot wide access road.

Viewings can be arranged by appointment only.

Price negotiable.
